name.baseName: LFP combined pyrometallurgical and hydrometallurgical recycling (LCIA)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The waste LFP battery is pyrolyzed, crushed, sieved and magnetically separated to obtain the waste LFP battery cathode material, which is alkaline dissolved; the residues containing iron and lithium are obtained, and then iron, lithium, and phosphorus sources are added, and roasted to obtain the new LFP cathode material.
对废旧LFP电池进行热解、破碎、筛分、磁选，得到碱性溶解的废旧LFP蓄电池正极材料；获得含有铁和锂的残留物，然后加入铁、锂和磷源，并进行焙烧以获得新的LFP正极材料。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit for this study is the vehicle travelling distance of a single power system during its life cycle (250,000 km).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: As for the power battery, the data and recycling technology are presented by Brunp (a subsidiary of CATL).
至于动力电池，数据和回收技术由Brump（CATL的子公司）提供。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Classification, characterisation and normalisation are applied to analyse the environmental impacts.
应用分类、特征化和归一化来分析环境影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yu, A., Wei, Y., Chen, W., Peng, N. & Peng, L. Life cycle environmental impacts and carbon emissions: A case study of electric and gasoline vehicles in China. Transportation Research Part D: Transport and Environment 65, 409–420 (2018).

Yu, A., Wei, Y., Chen, W., Peng, N. & Peng, L. Life cycle environmental impacts and carbon emissions: A case study of electric and gasoline vehicles in China. Transportation Research Part D: Transport and Environment 65, 409–420 (2018).

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.; Documentation: The review of the documentation was performed by Ecobilan and is in compliance with ISO 14040 and 14044. The data set documentation is correct in view of the appropriateness of the information provided. It includes all relevant information in view of data quality and scope of application of the respective LCI result.
